content.name: Jheng-Hao Lin
education: Bachelor of Landscape Design, National Taiwan University
Studying BSc Computer Science in Goldsmiths, University of London
content.shortProfile: Moved from the practical creative domain to the digital creative area because of my passion and enthusiasm for programming, I am pursuing my second undergraduate degree. With freelance, entrepreneurship and web development experience gained via works and internships. Now seeking software development, web development and data science opportunities.
